public abstract class SimulatorComponentNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements SimulatorComponentInt

basic node class implements basic node functionality NOTE FOR MODULE WRITERS: USE THIS CLASS TO IMPLEMENT A NEW MODULE NODE!

Author:
dominik
